reviews.review: Mindblowingly amazing
This is an awesome game and even more awesome when you get it for FREE (thankyou Valve)! Nothing you haven't heard before. Get this. :)
I saw someone describe Portal 2 as both the best game they've ever played, and the best novel they've ever read. I can't think of a better way to say it. Many thumbs up. <3
Best game of its kind :D
YAYYYY
E' più che una figata!!!!!  E' stupendo!!!!
More fun than almost anything else I've played.  I love the puzzles to solve, the sassy computer and the idiot bobblehead. :-)  It also is fun to knock over the guns and hear them apologizing.

The story, characters, and writing are all just as good as the original; funny and clever.

The graphics are even better.

The puzzles, however, are not. Rather than the portals being the puzzle, the puzzles tend to focus more on all the various other tools they've added to the game, while any actual "portal" based puzzle is relegated to a "where's Waldo" hunt-and-seek. 

For me, the most "difficult" of puzzles were actually just me not realizing that I had reached the end of a puzzle, and had to find that one tiny little blotch of pixels hidden either at a great distance or behind several chunks of scenery to advance. (I once spent ten minutes exploring a vast space because I had completely solved a puzzle, but had no idea where to go next).

Worse, portals increased "suction" mechanic can prevent you from solving a puzzle in a unique way.

Absolutely worth buying, just don't expect a more difficult game.

Parfait alliage entre réflexion et humour Valve ! 
Semblera Génial pour les néophytes et Sublime pour les amateurs.

Un must-have vidéoludique !

If you suffer brain damage, this game is not meant for you.

If you were replaced and put in a potato, this game is not meant for you.

If you are a lunatic AI that likes neurotoxin and murdering people, this game is meant for you.

Science wins.

It's only April, and we may already have what deserves to be the winner of just about every "Game of the Year" award imaginable. After a lot of anticipation and a lot of hype, Portal 2 delivers everything promised and icing on top. This game is special. It deserves to be called a video game masterpiece.  Or even, simply, a masterpiece. The voice acting is incredible, the humor is hilarious, the gameplay is **WARNING: Test subject rendered speechless. Attempting to reboot**. Both the single player and the Co-op play are simply excellent. There is nothing about this game that isn't fun. It is a game for anyone and everyone. There is only one flaw I can find in Portal 2: it has an end. Perhaps that can be fixed with an update. ;)

Seriously, this game is worth it even at full price. When it inevitably goes on sale, if you don't already own it by that time, you will have to be absolutely out of your mind bonkers to not get it.

What a sequel should be. Replayablity is low, but otherwise a great story and a great game. 

10/10.
Amazing story filled with twists, thrills, and lots of great dialogue and humor from start to finish. Then a Co-op to play through with a friend with even more of the same! Worth every penny!
Hilarious!
Really good, especially co-op!! best game so far in 2011!!! :D
Really fun and neat, great sequel.
Portal 2 is the sickest game I've ever played
GLaDOS would have made amazing french fries.
What can I say. certainly the best puzzle game you can get!
super jeu
the best game about shooting magic science holes since HALO!!  A+/10!!
I approve.
in this game you shoot some guys with holes and then you shoot  another hole now you have a hole  its all yours. this is twisted as hell yet i cant stop laughing

An astonishing sequel and well worth the money. The lenth is vastly improved over the first game yet never outstays it's welcome. The story is brilliant as always and if you haven't played yet, you must do so.
This game is incredible.
Now you're thinking with portals. And gels.

Uno de los mejores juegos de Valve. Muy buena la historia, que conserva el humor de la primera parte. El cooperativo es recomendable jugarlo al lado de tu compañero. Imprescindible, al igual que el 1.
Best VALVe game made to date. Ever. Even with TF2 forcing hats in. If you don't buy this, you are a Monster
If you liked the original you'll love this, and if you've never played Portal before, try it. =)
Enorme jeu, tout au long du solo j'ai bavé, et à la fin, il me fallait une bassine. en un mot ENORME.
I just love this game too much .... Volvo PLS PORTAL 3 NOW !

It's just as good as everyone says it it or even better.
A little bit easy on the test chamders but there is a LOT more than Portal 1
The graphics is outstanding
Everyone should play this!
Portal 2. Simply Brilliant and probably the best 10 hours spent on a single player game this year. Make sure you play Portal 1 first though or a lot of the humpr will be lost.
Nice game and it has a good story.

Portal was perfect. If possible this one goes beyond that.
This is not just "more of the same": the story pushes you along 8 hours of fun and creative puzzles, without ever getting frustrating. The coop mode is even more challenging and rewarding. I also expect a lot more content coming from the community. So far, this is the best game of 2011.

I boast of its beastfully brilliant beauty and of its bloody brilliant farce.  Seriously, this is a GREAT game, with fun puzzles, and is FAMILY FRIENDLY, unless you have a family of turrets... you might not enjoy it quite as much if you do.

I preordered this game and hardly ever do preorders.  I was not disappointed.  It is exciting from beginning to end.  The story parallels Greek mythology with a new spin.  The voice acting is top notch, the humor is legendary.  The gameplay is fantastic & doesn't grow stale.

A true 10/10 masterpiece.
The perfect game? No. What are you crazy? Very good though. Excellent even.
Fantastic game. Must buy. No questions asked. If you liked the first one, this one is every bit improved with a much more focused story.
Great game and the puzzles are fun. Also a bit of a laugh in places. A must buy! :)

Well, I can honestly say that was one of the best gaming experiences I've ever had. Portal 2 was extremely well designed, cleverly written, gorgeous, and I had a huge grin on the entire time. Bravo, Valve, for somehow managing to top yourself each and every time. You've sent me on an incredible ride. And for that, I thank you.
Stupendo! Erano anni che non mi divertivo così con un videogame!
love this too, buy it and show me how it's done!
I Laughed, I cried, I pee'd in my pants and all over the floor, but thats cuz portal 2 was so good it gave me a bladder infection.

I'll be honest I did not have very high expectations for Portal 2. When I heard there was a cooperative mode and saw some good reviews from friends I instantly had to have 2 licenses so that my wife and I can play. We've had a TON of fun, its also great team building / communication therapy ;) The quirky animations of the characters and the brilliant writing = endless amounts of fun!

It's a game with alots of jokes and fun moments, challenging puzzles and an intresting story, it also gives you the opertunety to look into aperture science past which just adds to the experience. 

It's a great follow up to the last portal but i only have one complaint, it is to short.

Valve did a grate job and i hope to see more of this universe they have created.
Awwwwesome game!  Great single player and highly amusing co-op, DEFINATELY worth a go!
Great co-op game to play. Only 5 hrs long though.
Witziges Game mit guter Mischung aus Humor und Puzzle-Action ..... ein Muss für jeden Steam-User !!!
Simply "Art in movement" ! A Must Have For all "True Gamers"!  Thx Valve :)
Awesome sequel! One of the best game valve made so far!....well in fact everything valve make is awesome! BUY IT!
The cake was a lie. Now the potato is at it.
Amazing experience. A bit on the short side, but it was still more fun replaying the game than grinding through my backlog. Definitely worth it!
Great puzzle game, great story, great humour, fun coop. This game is so polished, art direction, sounds, music.
For Science!

A very good game. It's a game that I strongly recommend. The co-op Is very vun. And the singleplayer has multiple chapters to play leaving hours of fun. And its graphics are excellent. It Has a really good ending, And I really recommend this to anyone who wants a good puzzle/adventure game.
It's like Portal 2, only longer and better in every aspect. GET MAD

The wait for Portal 2 was very much worth it. It's bursting with content, both singleplayer and co-op. You could really see how much thought was put into the level design. Voice work and music is amazing, too~!

Great game, fun, logical got to think on your toes to complete the puzzles. Only played a few games single player, played loads co-op. Requires team work, communication and a real top laugh. You can also make it hell for you team mate adds to the extra fun and laughs.

Only down side is it get a little teedius if played in long bursts and some of the puzzles are really easy.

9/10

The long awaited sequal to the increddibly popular game, Portal.

This game is set, i believe, a few years after the first game. And right from the start this game sets out to be amazing.

The puzzles in this game start out very easy and progressively gets harder and harder.

The story in this game is SO great compared to the first. (Which, i know, is not a fair comparison. Since the first game was only a test to see how people would react to it)
It colides so greatly with the Half-life storyline aswelll, and even has some teasers for Episode 3.

This game is truly the best of it's puzzle / action genre. And it leaves you with a big ''Ahhhh! Why didn't i think of that before'' feeling so many times throughout the game.
Possibly my favorite single player experience of all time. OF ALL TIME.

The gameplay has definitely been diluted to put the story in there. The first Portal didn't have protracted linear-path forced-marches between chambers.
But they weren't annoyingly long, and the story was quite amusing, so it's forgiven.

Perhaps one of the best games to be released by Valve. It's a higly entertaining emotional rollercoaster ride, one that will give you high hopes and later crushing 'em.  Portal 2 also features a fantastic, engaging, hillarious plot (and soundtrack) with many twists and turns. Ironically, this game forces you to think with portals as many levels will leave you shaking your head is disbelief when a puzzle that should theoretically only take 5 minutes to complete takes you more than 15. It certainly is a satisfying feeling when completing a complex puzzle. 

This game easily gets a 5/5, just make sure you have a friend to enjoy co-op with.
loop da loop shoop da woop
soooooooooooooooooooooo fun
The best humoristic puzzle type fps i've ever played since Portal 1.
Fun fun fun :)
Best game I'v ever played in my life! (tied with Team Fortress 2)
I cannot recommend it highly enough.  Funny, clever and fun.

Not quite as good as Portal 1. Mainly because it lost all of its charm and simplicity that made the first game such a hit.

It’s a good puzzle game, but all the inside jokes are gone, and the writing on the wall isn't as meaningful and the ending credits song didn't leave me singing it for hours.

So all in all...... good game, but not a good sequel to one of the best games in history.
Can we get some coop going on?
Oh good lord, how did this end up being even better than the original?

Let me tell you, son.  This game right here is one for the record books.  I'd say it's easily one of the best titles of all time and I would be willing to put money on the fact that it won't be easily topped.  It builds so much onto the meager framework that the original Portal put forward and really goes the extra mile to immerse you in the game.  Furthermore, the puzzles manage to be fresh and challenging without being frustrating to the point that you'd want to snap your keyboard in half.  The endgame is so incredible I dare not spoil it here.

I can't speak for the co-op mode from personal experience since my internet is currently the most terrible it's been since dial-up, but I can say that this marks the first time I've ever seen a multiplayer mode to a game that not only has a story but whose story is connected directly to that of the single player mode.

What it comes down to is this: play it at all costs.  You will not regret it unless somebody has literally removed your soul.
An awesome game that everyone on Steam should own.
Like a book that you can't put down, I couldn't stop playing this game from the moment I started until I beat it late that night.
Simply fun!
Addictive, hilarious, inventive, humbling, down right fun.  10 of 10.  Best game I've played in a few years.

Not even remotely as enjoyable as the first. It's funny, but the puzzles are dull and linear. It's just a puzzle game rather than a physics puzzle game. Physics-based puzzles means the potential to do something unique... not here. Invisible walls exist everywhere except for when they want to let you fall. 

The puzzles were easy, but time consuming enough that you spent more time building the solution than solving the problem. Portal physics is used at a bare minimum and pretty much replaced by goo. You just have to position the goo where you want it rather than really working the physics,.

It's be worth 30, and no more.
Goes without saying that this game is one of the best of 2011
Worth it for the script and dialog alone :)
sicomatic geilomat!

Lovely, wonderful, fun and hilarious, from the moment you wake up until the fat turret sings.

And then you discover co-op and it's even better.
best game ever!

One of the best gaming experiences of my life, and I haven't even touched the co-op yet. By far, the funniest game I've ever played, but also surprisingly touching and intense at times. It's got that oh-so-elusive magic that every creator seeks to imbue in his or her art, the kind that makes you feel like the universe you just visited is still living even when you're not in it. An incredible, incredible game.

Stop reading this recommendation. Go and play the game if you haven't already, Portal 2 is the shit.

Forget anything and everything else that has ever happened in your life -- Portal 2 is better.
shit game. dont waste your time. play drgaon age 2 instead. much better imho.

the only game i know about with more trailers then screenshots,
this game is truly credit to team...
bit short though.
WHERES THE DLC?

ITS MIGHTY FINE!

This game is just a masterpiece... so well designed and very funny.  Get Portal, finish it (it doesn't take too long) then get Portal 2.  Its a gem.
Portal 2 is an amzing solo/co-op game with an interesting story. i would advise getting Portal 1 first before playing Portal 2 ;). So you know what it is all about.
BEST....GAME....EVAH
10/10 I highly recommend this for any portal fan!
Valve has done it again. Portal 2 is awesome. Very impressive graphics coming from the Source engine. Loads of fun, plus co-op!

WOW!  I never, ever buy a game full price but my husband talked me into getting the 2-pack pre-release.  I am so glad he did.  I found the single-player game to be incredible, engaging and breathtakingly awesome, just the scope and look of it all.  The multi-player really puts it over the top and makes it completely worth the price.  I think they've made a number of improvements over Portal (which was an excellent game in its own right, mind you) making it more cerebral and less speed-of-clicking-FTW (though there's still a bit of that, too).  I found myself thinking more, but getting stumped less.  Very satisfying.
Its better that the first one
Buy it buy it buy it

This game, man.

This game.



You should play it.

Mein Tipp: Kaufen !!
Wie gewohnt geniale Rätsel, irrsinnige Sprünge, schneller, bunter, zynischer, einfach noch besser als der ersteTeil.
